text: Akrep IIe ("Scorpion") is a Turkish electric-drive armored Infantry mobility vehicle produced by Otokar as further devekopment of Otokar Akrep. The vehicle was introduced at the International Defence Industry Fair 2019 IDEF in Istanbul. ==References== Category:Armoured fighting vehicles of Turkey Category:Battery electric vehicles Akrep
title: Otokar Akrep IIe
